author: Courtenay Brown
title: Stock market tumbles as coronavirus stimulus hangs in limbo
description: Stocks closed down about 3% on Monday, though they finished above the lowest levels of the day. By the numbers: The S&P 500 joined the Dow in shedding all the gains since President Trump's inauguration in 2017, a nod to how steep the market drop has been in a…
content:
More than 1.5 billion people globally have been asked to stay home to stop the spread of the the novel coronavirus, which has infected more than 362,000 people worldwide, AP reports. 
The big picture: Governments around the globe are trying to curb the huge … [+186 chars]
